tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab gives you a basic overview of Fleet Patching and Provisioning

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create the Environment with Resource Manager
tutorials.description: If you are not running the LiveLab Green Button, you will need to provision the environment yourself

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Get Acquainted with the Environment and the rhpctl Command line tool
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to start using Oracle Fleet Patching and Provisioning

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Import Gold Images
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to import and query gold images into the FPP Server

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Provision an Oracle Restart environment
tutorials.description: This lab shows how FPP can provision Grid Infrastructure and Oracle Restart environments

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Install the Oracle Database homes (working copies)
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to provision working copies to remote targets

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Patch the database
tutorials.description: This lab shows how FPP can patch databases

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
